start.description: You find yourself in a dark empty crypt. There is an eerie feel to this place.

candle.description: The only light source is a small candle burning in the corner.
candle.message: It's almost out, and is stuck fast to the ground.

bone.description: You see a pile of bones in front of you and a door towards the east.

dragonCell.description: You see a staircase leading into the darkness in the north, a steel gate to the south and a large corridor to the east.

dragon.description: There is a giant dragon that lay sleeping in front of it. It seems to be guarding a passage way.

dragon.altDescription: You see the giant dragon you had slain with it's entrails strewn across the stone floor.

portcullis.description: A portcullis is drawn up. You are standing just outside a sprawling castle with dark walls.

dungeon.description: You enter a small dungeon where you see ancient runes scrawled across the walls.

key.description: There is a single key lying on the floor.
key.message: You have a key. But you do not know what it opens.

weaponsRoom.description: You enter a room full of weapons. You see swords, knives, spears, staffs, and hammers displayed all around you. Large windows illuminate the room with the daylight outside.

key.solution: You unlock the gate and enter.

sword.message: Good choice. You now have a sword.

spear.message: Great choice! You now have a spear.

staff.message: Excellent choice. You now have a staff.
